column5: UUU Interesting little company here Will outperform on a trade deal Its a company that can double its share price on a trade deal just because of the type of exposure they have to China Also as current tarrifs remain UUU has begun to stabilize the passthrough of extra costs The longer the trade war goes the more UUU will pass through cost increases Then when the trade deal is in place they wont need to give it all back and margins will increase Neat opportunity
